issue.title: Empty buffer should have a valid address
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6268](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6268). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part of arrow buffer refactoring, the empty buffers are created with invalid addresses.

This breaks client code that assumed that even empty buffers are valid.

Return the address of the static EMPTY buffer.
